statements: DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE page_url = 'example.com' AND date_visited = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE id = 1 AND page_url = 'https://example.com'
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE date_visited < '2022-01-01' AND time_spent_on_page > 60
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE page_url = 'example.com' AND visit_duration > 60;
DELETE FROM marketing_performance_data WHERE campaign_id = 100 AND clicks < 50;
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM search_queries WHERE timestamp < '2021-12-31' AND page_url = '/search';
DELETE FROM click_rates WHERE click_location = 'Header' AND click_time < '2022-01-01';
